org.biogeomancer.validation
Class OriginalRecordSet

java.lang.Object
  org.gbif.datatester.RamRecordSet
      org.biogeomancer.validation.OriginalRecordSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.gbif.datatester.GenericRecordSet
public class OriginalRecordSet
extends org.gbif.datatester.RamRecordSet

An adapter class to use the original records of a BioGeomancer record set as a GenericRecordSet in the data tester framework context.

Author:
Renato De Giovanni ( renato at cria . org . br )

Constructor Detail

OriginalRecordSet

public OriginalRecordSet(RecSet bgRecSet)
                  throws org.gbif.datatester.exception.RecordSetException

Contructs an OriginalRecordSet for validation purposes based on a BioGeomancer RecSet. The default set of concepts will be used.

Parameters:
bgRecSet - BioGeomancer RecSet object.
Throws:
org.gbif.datatester.exception.RecordSetException

OriginalRecordSet

public OriginalRecordSet(RecSet bgRecSet,
                         java.util.Set concepts)
                  throws org.gbif.datatester.exception.RecordSetException

Contructs an OriginalRecordSet for validation purposes based on a BioGeomancer RecSet. In this case the list of concepts to be used is passed as a parameter.

Parameters:
bgRecSet - BioGeomancer RecSet object.
concepts - Complete set of concepts (static + dynamic) for the record set.
Throws:
org.gbif.datatester.exception.RecordSetException
Method Detail

Returns the original BioGeomancer RecSet.

Returns:

getConcepts

public java.util.Set getConcepts()

Returns the whole set of concepts being considered in the record set.

Complete set of Concepts.
